name: Mini Golden Tigris Cub
description:
This furry companion may seem cute now, but one day it will grow into a fearsome predator.
Combine a Golden Tigris Cub, a Green Tigris Cub, and a Blue Tigris Cub with 20 Unidentified Dyes in the Mystic Forge to create a Mini Mist Shadow Tigris Cub.
Combine a Golden Tigris Cub, a Black Tigris Cub, and a Pink Tigris Cub with 20 Unidentified Dyes in the Mystic Forge to create a Mini Blazing Tigris Cub.
